frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Co-located Alongside KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America
frontmatter.venue: LE MÉRIDIEN SALT LAKE CITY DOWNTOWN, 131 South 300 West
frontmatter.venue_address: 131 South 300 West,  Salt Lake City, Utah, 84101, United States
frontmatter.registration_text2: CFPs are Open: Apply to Speak
frontmatter.lead_text: This in person OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on November 12th live in Salt Lake City, Utah and co-located with CNCF's KubeCon + CloudNativeCon NA.
frontmatter.info_text: This Gathering will focus on talks from and by Cloud Native practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.

schedule.session_name: OpenShift Release Update and Road Map
AMA Session: Live Q/A with Guest Speakers, Red Hat Engineers & Project Leads
